snippet.title: Watch the emotional moment a newborn baby clings to her mother's face after birth
snippet.content:
The emotional moment newborn baby clings to mum's face 1:20
Watch the emotional moment a new born baby clings on to her mother's face after meeting for the first time. Video: CATERS TV
August 7th 2017 4 hours ago /display/newscorpaustralia.com/Web/NewsNetwork/Lifestyle - syndicated/
Agata Coelho clings to her mother Brenda Coelho de Souza, 24, just moments after birth. Picture: Caters News
Katy GillCaters News Agency
Share
WATCH the emotional moment a newborn baby clings onto her mother's face after meeting her for the first time. Agata Ribeiro Coelho was born via caesarean on April 5 in Santa Monica Hospital, Brazil. The bub was placed on her adoring mother, Brenda Coelho de Souza, 24, and the connection was instant. Agata appears to kiss her mother's cheek as the medical team watch on in awe. Brenda, an administrative assistant, said: "It was an incredible moment when my daughter hugged me for the first time."
Little Agata and her parents in the birthing suite. Picture: Caters NewsSource:Caters News Agency "The medical team were great and were all really surprised that she acted this way, they couldn't believe how affectionate she was with me. "Agata is now three months old and is doing great, every day is a surprise and I love being a mother."
